title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-1.7 - Acceptance of awards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-1.7 - Acceptance of awards

State Regulations

An academic performance award shall be deemed vacant
unless an acceptance thereof is filed with the department within such period
after notification to the person entitled thereto as the commissioner shall
establish. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
145-1.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
